name: PNB Pre-Approved Loan Scam
description: Scammer offers a fake pre-approved personal loan from PNB at impossibly low interest rates, collecting processing fees to a scammer account.

turns.scammer_message: Congratulations! Punjab National Bank has pre-approved a personal loan of Rs 10,00,000 at just 2.5% interest rate. Limited time offer. Apply now before it expires!
turns.notes: Initial bait with attractive loan offer.

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for your interest! To process your pre-approved loan of Rs 10 lakh, a small processing fee of Rs 2,999 is required. Please call our loan officer at +91-9988776655 to proceed with documentation.
turns.notes: Phone number revealed for 'loan officer' contact.

turns.scammer_message: Your loan application ID is PNB-LA-2026-88341. To complete processing, please transfer the fee of Rs 2,999 to our official processing account: 3344556677889900 (PNB Loan Processing Division).
turns.notes: Bank account revealed for processing fee.

turns.scammer_message: For your convenience, you can also pay the processing fee via UPI to pnb.loan@oksbi. Once payment is confirmed, your loan amount of Rs 10,00,000 will be credited to your account within 24 hours.
turns.notes: UPI ID provided as alternative payment.

turns.scammer_message: Dear customer, your pre-approved loan offer expires today. We have reserved Rs 10 lakh for you. Pay Rs 2,999 to pnb.loan@oksbi or call +91-9988776655 now. Don't miss this once-in-a-lifetime offer!
turns.notes: Final pressure with deadline and repeated details.
